mdRecord.dcterms:description: The original building built between 1902 and 1911. Additions from 1916–1917 and 1924–1926 completed by Esenwein and Johnson. Lobby decorated in 1942 in the Art Moderne style. Renovation and rehabilitation completed 2012; hotel now contains one & two bedroom apartments, hotel rooms, bars, restaurants and banquet facilities. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hotel_Lafayette [work]
